trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations! You have done it!

Unlock your first hero and blaze a new path through the game. Embrace the feeling of adventure as you discover new abilities and strategies, and become a force to be reckoned with on the virtual battlefield.

Rack up your first 1000 Style Points and show the world your flair for the dramatic. Mix and match different clothing and skate parts to create a unique look that captures your personality and style, and watch as you amass a following of fans who admire your cool factor.

Purchase your first skin for a part of your skate and roll in style. From sleek, modern designs to funky and offbeat patterns, customize your skate and express your individuality with a variety of available skins.

Successfully complete your first match and revel in the taste of victory. Whether through sheer skill or clever tactics, savor the feeling of triumph and let it fuel you to continue achieving great things on the rink.

Experience your first loss and use it as fuel to come back stronger. Every defeat is an opportunity to learn and grow, and with each setback, you’ll discover new strategies and techniques that will ultimately make you a better player.
Earn a 100 drift combo and show off your precise control and finesse. With every perfect drift, you’ll demonstrate your mastery of the game’s mechanics and earn the respect of your fellow players.

Score 4 points in one game and prove your worth on the scoreboard. Through a combination of strategic positioning, quick reflexes, and expert timing, you’ll showcase your skills and demonstrate that you’re a force to be reckoned with.
Congrats on changing your skateboard wheels for the first time! You’ve upgraded your ride and opened up new possibilities for your skateboarding skills. Keep pushing yourself to new heights!

Unlock your third hero and expand your arsenal of skills and abilities. With each new hero, you’ll gain access to a unique set of strengths and weaknesses, allowing you to experiment with different playstyles and approaches.

Reach 3000 Style Points and become a true superstar of the skate world. From flashy tricks to stylish outfits, your flair for the dramatic will earn you the adoration of your fans and establish you as a true icon of the game.

Collect skins for all three parts of your skate and establish your fashion dominance. With an extensive collection of skins to choose from, you’ll be able to create a look that’s uniquely your own and set the trend for the rest of the community.

Achieve a 200 drift combo and show off your unmatched control and skill. With each flawless drift, you’ll cement your status as a master of the game’s mechanics and leave your opponents in awe of your ability.

Score 8 points in one game and demonstrate your mastery of the game’s mechanics. Through a combination of strategic positioning, quick reflexes, and expert timing, you’ll showcase your skills and demonstrate that you’re a force to be reckoned with.
Way to go on upgrading your speed for the first time! This is a game-changer that will give you a significant advantage over your opponents. Keep pushing yourself to new heights!

Collect skins for all parts of your skate and cement your status as a fashion icon of the skate world. With your extensive collection of skins and accessories, you’ll be able to create a look that’s truly unique and sets the standard for the rest of the community.

Reach 5000 Style Points and ascend to the very top of the fashion hierarchy. With your keen sense of style and unparalleled ability to perform flashy tricks, you’ll become a true icon of the skate world and inspire others to follow in your footsteps.

Achieve a 500 drift combo and become the stuff of legends. With your unmatched control and precision, you’ll dazzle your opponents and leave them in awe of your abilities, cementing your status as a true master of the game’s mechanics.

Score 12 points in one game and show off your strategic prowess. Through a combination of clever positioning, quick reflexes, and expert timing, you’ll showcase your skills and prove that you’re one of the best players in the game.
Way to go on adding neon to your skate! This bold choice shows that you’re not afraid to stand out from the crowd. Keep pushing the limits!

Flip over on your head and showcase your daring and bravery. With this high-risk maneuver, you’ll prove that you’re not afraid to take chances and push the limits of what’s possible, inspiring others to do the same.

Unlock every hero in the game and become the ultimate Hero Collector. Your mastery of each hero’s unique abilities and strengths has made you an unbeatable force on the rink. You’re always ready to adapt to any challenge, and your ability to switch between heroes on the fly has made you a true master of the game.
